title: WTB: T206 Tolstoi back in low grade
author: freakhappy

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Tolstoi back in low grade
posts.post_content:
;)Looking to buy a few low grade Tolstoi backs to add to my collection...preferably in the poor to VG range.  Doesn't matter who it is, but not looking to spend a crazy amount, so probably a common or poor to fair HOFer.

PM or email: [url]cavelyon@aol.com[/url]
